sentences: Bobby Irwin (23 March 1953 â€“ 8 May 2015) was an English drummer, record producer and songwriter.
Robert was his given name, and Trehern was his mother's maiden name.
Irwin died of cancer on 8 May 2015 in Twickenham.
His funeral was held at St. Stephen's Church, Twickenham, on 19 May.
Among those who attended were Nick Lowe, Geraint Watkins, saxophonist Martin Winning and Neil Brockbank, who also died of cancer two years later in 2017.
